page.title: 17Employment
page.content: There are four farms on our block, which altogether approx employ 12 full time workers. There is a sawmill in our block which is due to close down. Because of this 13 people will{lose their {jobs.}The land that the sawmill is on will be used for a new development. The new development will consist of a licensed restaurant and a ship chandlery which will serve a marina, and will{give employment}to several people. There are two doctor's surgeries which employ approx 14{part time workers. There are also two dentists which employ approx 5 people . Approx one quarter of people who work in our block do not live in our block.
